info-column.description: You can contact us and provide support by using our filling the contact form.

banner.description: We are expanding our organization, which we started in 2018, in a way that will benefit the whole world. We aim to touch the lives of thousands of people and meet their needs with this completely free work. As 3D Donate, our goal is education, health, child development, social development, nature and animals all over the world. to provide support such as protection.

description: 3DDonate.com, Occupational therapist İsmail İşler and Emre Akıncı PhD. was organized by Zaxe 3D with the support of Zaxe Z3 3D printers to produce products for all creatures in need, completely free of charge.
Our products are free of charge, including production and shipping services. It is produced with PLA or ABS filament depending on the need.

section-how-help.description: You can give information about this formation to individuals in need around you. You can be a local supporter of this project in your region. If you have a 3D printer, you can support by printing for the demands in your city.

mini-sections.description: Want to join our efforts but don't know where to start? ,Donate your time and contact us by e-mail to give support.
As 3Ddonate, the material and moral contribution of everyone from all over the world will make us stronger so that we can reach wider audiences.
We believe that the most effective way for our initiatives to be successful is for the community to actively participate in us. For more information, please contact us by e-mail.

products.header: Which product are you looking for?

Do not hesitate to search!

not-found.description: The page you're looking for is not found.
